typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		beer_ABV as double,
		beer_beerId as integer,
		beer_brewerId as integer,
		beer_name as string,
		beer_style as string,
		review_appearance as double,
		review_palette as double,
		review_overall as double,
		review_taste as double,
		review_profileName as string,
		review_aroma as double,
		review_time as integer,
		review_text as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		review_overall,
		review_profileName,
		review_text
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1 derive(review_text = replace(review_text, ",", "")) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		beername as string,
		rating as string,
		user as string,
		beer_beerId as string,
		BeerId_count as string,
		BeerID_Rank as string
	),
	filePattern:'TextBeerProject.csv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TextBeerData
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'dbo.BeerProject.csv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FullBeerData
